# image

**Instance Property**

The image that the button displays.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var image: NSImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The combo button scales the image to fit within its bounds. Use the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSComboButton/imageScaling] property to specify the scaling behavior to use with your image.

## Configuring the Button Appearance

- **style**: The appearance setting that determines how the button presents its menu .
- **NSComboButton.Style**: Constants that indicate how a combo button presents its menu.
- **title**: The localized string that the button displays.
- **imageScaling**: The scaling behavior to apply to the button’s image.
